entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 30%
